headline: The Kroger Co.: Attractive Even In This Environment
summary: Kroger's stock outpaces the S&P 500, driven by digital growth and own-brand success. Read why it's still a Buy despite mixed 2024 results.

raw.headline: The Kroger Co.: Attractive Even In This Environment
raw.summary: Kroger's stock outpaces the S&P 500, driven by digital growth and own-brand success. Read why it's still a Buy despite mixed 2024 results.

headline: Worried About Trump's New Tariffs? These 3 U.S. Companies Are Set to Weather the Storm
summary: Kroger (NYSE: KR) was one of them.  CFO Todd Foley noted in the company's fourth-quarter earnings call last month that Kroger could be affected somewhat by tariffs.  Foley singled out Kroger's produce business as the area that could be most affected.
